entry.title: Friday: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow early this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
